Package x10.awt

API's for building awt-based X10 Modules and Virtual Controllers.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ApplianceUnitPanel ApplianceUnitPanel is an awt-based panel that can be used to control an X10 appliance module.
ApplicationUnitPanel ApplicationUnitPanel is a UnitPanel that can be used to execute external programs.
LightUnitPanel LightUnitPanel is an awt-based panel that can be used to control a dimmable X10 light module.
MasterUnitPanel MasterUnitPanel is an awt-based panel that can be used to control all connected X10 modules.
UnitPanel UnitPanel is the superclass extended by all awt x10 virtual unit panels.
 

Package x10.awt Description

API's for building awt-based X10 Modules and Virtual Controllers.
